chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:

A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
gb: mon n * bool -> bool
gm: mon n * bool -> mon n

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> divP a b

Premises:

eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
zeroP_plusTermr : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
zeroP_plusTerml : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
divTerm_compo : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c), divP a b -> divP b c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc))
eqTerm_plusTerm_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b d)
T1_multTerm_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
divTerm_on_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
divP_comp_ppc0 : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> forall nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b), list (Term A n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=a) nZa))
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
divP_comp_ppc1 : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)), list (Term A n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=b) nZb))
divTerm_def : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> divP a b
divTerm_on_plusM_minusM : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a = mult_mon n (div_mon n (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b)) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
T1_multTerm_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a)
divTerm_dec : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)}
divP_on_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> divP a b
multTerm_plusTerm_dist_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) c)
divA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 d : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZd : ~ eqA d A0), eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c0 d nZd)
divP_plusTerm : forall a b c : Term A n, divP a c -> divP b c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> divP (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) c

```coq
intros a b nZb H.
apply divP_ind.
intros a' b' nZb' H'.
apply divP_inv3 in H'.
rewrite <- H'.
apply eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm.
exact cs.
apply eqT_sym.
exact H'.
apply zeroP_plusTerml.
exact cs.
exact H'.
exact nZb'.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b nZb H. apply divP_ind. intros a' b' nZb' H'. apply divP_inv3 in H'. rewrite <- H'. apply eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm. apply cs. apply eqT_sym. apply H'. apply zeroP_plusTerml. apply cs. apply H'. apply nZb'.
